message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount from its true value, and I'm confident it will be a game-changer for your business.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
